faqSection.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faqSection.subtitle: Answers to common questions about our roofing and construction expertise.

items.question: Do you provide service in my area?
items.answer: As a nationwide roofing contractor, we operate local crews in major metropolitan regions across the U.S. From Texas to New York and Florida to Arizona, our teams are positioned to serve you. Visit our Locations page or call us to confirm availability.

items.question: Are you properly licensed and insured?
items.answer: Absolutely. Dolimiti Steel Roofing maintains all required state licenses and carries comprehensive liability and workers‚Äô compensation insurance for your protection.

items.question: Do you provide financing options?
items.answer: Yes! We collaborate with reputable lending partners to offer flexible financing solutions for roof replacements and large-scale repairs, subject to credit approval.

items.question: What roofing systems do you install?
items.answer: We install a full range of roofing systems, including Asphalt Shingles, Standing Seam Metal, Clay & Concrete Tile, and Flat Roofing systems such as TPO, EPDM, and Foam.

items.question: Do you assist with insurance claims?
items.answer: Yes. Our storm restoration specialists guide you through the insurance claim process, ensuring accurate damage documentation and proper coverage.

story.title: Our Company Story
paragraphs: Dolimiti Steel Roofing was founded with a clear mission: to deliver advanced steel roofing systems that outperform traditional materials in durability, efficiency, and lifespan.
Our team focuses exclusively on metal roofing, combining innovative installation methods with premium steel materials to provide superior protection and long-term performance.
